member.name: M:MTE.GrassLoader.RemoveOldGrasses
member.summary: Remove all grass objects under this GameObject
member.remarks: Please keep this method public, because MTE Editor will call this method.

member.name: M:MTE.GrassLoader.GenerateGrasses
member.summary: Generate grass instances in the scene
member.remarks: Please keep this method public, because MTE will call this method to generate grasses in editor.

member.name: M:MTE.GrassQuad.SaveLightmapData(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector4)
member.summary: Save lightmapping data to this GrassStar.

member.name: M:MTE.GrassStar.SaveLightmapData(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector4)
member.summary: Save lightmapping data to this GrassStar.

member.name: M:VertexColorInitializer.ApplyVertexColor
member.summary: Apply the vertex colors in the VertexColor asset file to the mesh
member.remarks: Please keep this method public, because MTE will call this method to apply vertex color in editor.
